SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, u.email AS user_email, o.order_code, o.order_status AS status, o.total_amount, o.receiver_name, o.receiver_phone, o.zip_code, o.address_base, o.address_detail, o.tracking_number, o.shipped_at, o.delivered_at FROM et_order o INNER JOIN et_user u ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}
